item.title: Apple and Google's Mobile 'Duopoly' Targeted by UK Regulators
item.description: Britain’s competition regulator has today outlined sweeping proposals that could force Apple to fundamentally alter how it operates its App Store, Safari browser, and iOS ecosystem in the UK. The Comp

item.title: BBC Studios Names Amanda Jones Chief Financial Officer
item.description: Taking over from Lorraine Burgess in August, she will join the BBC Studios executive committee and become a member of the commercial board.

item.title: BBC Studios Names Amanda Jones Chief Financial Officer
item.description: Taking over from Lorraine Burgess in August, she will join the BBC Studios executive committee and become a member of the commercial board.

item.title: UK May Backtrack on Controversial Demand for Backdoor to Encrypted Apple User Data
item.description: The British government may be forced to drop its plans to force Apple to build a backdoor to access encrypted user data, the Financial Times reports. In February, it emerged that the British governmen

item.description: The British government may be forced to drop its plans to force Apple to build a backdoor to access encrypted user data, the Financial Times reports. In February, it emerged that the British governmen

item.title: Kate Beckinsale Announces Death of Her Mother, British Actress Judy Loe, at 78: “I Am Paralyzed”
item.description: Loe, best known for her TV work on shows like ‘General Hospital,’ ‘Inspector Morse,’ ‘Casualty’ and ‘Holby City,’ died on July 15 following a stage four cancer diagnosis.

item.title: Kate Beckinsale Announces Death of Her Mother, British Actress Judy Loe, at 78: “I Am Paralyzed”
item.description: Loe, best known for her TV work on shows like ‘General Hospital,’ ‘Inspector Morse,’ ‘Casualty’ and ‘Holby City,’ died on July 15 following a stage four cancer diagnosis.

item.title: Ken Loach Joins Edinburgh Film Festival Speaker Lineup Alongside Kevin Macdonald, Nia DaCosta
item.description: Loach will speak at the Scottish film festival with his long-time collaborators, writer Paul Laverty and producer Rebecca O’Brien, about their Palme d’Or-winning films.

item.title: Ken Loach Joins Edinburgh Film Festival Speaker Lineup Alongside Kevin Macdonald, Nia DaCosta
item.description: Loach will speak at the Scottish film festival with his long-time collaborators, writer Paul Laverty and producer Rebecca O’Brien, about their Palme d’Or-winning films.

item.title: Tina Fey and Charlie Brooker Set for Edinburgh TV Festival
item.description: Stephen Lambert, Graham Norton, Shonda Rhimes and Michael Sheen are also among confirmed attendees at the 50th edition of the TV fest in Scotland.

item.title: Tina Fey and Charlie Brooker Set for Edinburgh TV Festival
item.description: Stephen Lambert, Graham Norton, Shonda Rhimes and Michael Sheen are also among confirmed attendees at the 50th edition of the TV fest in Scotland.

item.title: Cocky cop jailed for stealing bitcoins had log of his crypto theft in his office
item.description: Silk Road criminal tipped police off to dirty cop who stole 50 seized bitcoins.

item.title: Joanna Bacon, British Actress Known for ‘Love Actually’ and ‘Breeders,’ Dies at 72
item.description: Bacon’s death was confirmed by the Harlow Theatre Company this week, who said she passed away on June 14 following a battle with cancer.

item.title: Joanna Bacon, British Actress Known for ‘Love Actually’ and ‘Breeders,’ Dies at 72
item.description: Bacon’s death was confirmed by the Harlow Theatre Company this week, who said she passed away on June 14 following a battle with cancer.

item.title: Filming Underway on Season 2 of Netflix’s ‘Geek Girl,’ Layton Williams Joins Cast
item.description: Based on Holly Smale’s bestselling novels, the show follows socially awkward but endearing teenager Harriet Manners (Em Carey) as she’s unexpectedly thrust into the fashion world.

item.title: Filming Underway on Season 2 of Netflix’s ‘Geek Girl,’ Layton Williams Joins Cast
item.description: Based on Holly Smale’s bestselling novels, the show follows socially awkward but endearing teenager Harriet Manners (Em Carey) as she’s unexpectedly thrust into the fashion world.

item.title: Sky and ITV Renew Long-Standing Content Deal
item.description: ITV’s biggest shows, such as ‘Love Island’ and ‘Trigger Point,’ will remain available across all Sky TV platforms in Britain.

item.title: Sky and ITV Renew Long-Standing Content Deal
item.description: ITV’s biggest shows, such as ‘Love Island’ and ‘Trigger Point,’ will remain available across all Sky TV platforms in Britain.

item.title: BBC Touts Record Digital Audience in Annual Report, Finds “No Evidence of Toxic Culture” After Huw Edwards Crimes
item.description: The U.K. broadcaster detailed how the company has remained the number one brand for media in the U.K., accruing over 4.5 billion viewing hours on BBC iPlayer alone.

item.title: BBC Touts Record Digital Audience in Annual Report, Finds “No Evidence of Toxic Culture” After Huw Edwards Crimes
item.description: The U.K. broadcaster detailed how the company has remained the number one brand for media in the U.K., accruing over 4.5 billion viewing hours on BBC iPlayer alone.

item.title: Gregg Wallace’s ‘MasterChef’ Co-Host John Torode Says He Has “No Recollection” of Making Racist Remark
item.description: After an inquiry into Wallace’s behavior revealed claims against two separate people, Torode said on Monday: “I am the individual who is alleged to have used racial language on one occasion.”

item.title: Gregg Wallace’s ‘MasterChef’ Co-Host John Torode Says He Has “No Recollection” of Making Racist Remark
item.description: After an inquiry into Wallace’s behavior revealed claims against two separate people, Torode said on Monday: “I am the individual who is alleged to have used racial language on one occasion.”

item.title: ‘The Real Housewives of London’ Sets Summer Launch Date, Debuts Teaser
item.description: Hayu’s first-ever original show will be available to stream in August, with episodes dropping weekly.

item.title: ‘The Real Housewives of London’ Sets Summer Launch Date, Debuts Teaser
item.description: Hayu’s first-ever original show will be available to stream in August, with episodes dropping weekly.

item.title: ‘A Good Girl’s Guide to Murder’ Unveils Season 2 Cast and Sneak Peek at Emma Myers’ Return
item.description: Misia Butler, Eden Hambelton Davies and Jack Rowan will step into fan-favorite roles for the return of the hit drama, based on Holly Jackson’s bestselling novels.

item.title: ‘A Good Girl’s Guide to Murder’ Unveils Season 2 Cast and Sneak Peek at Emma Myers’ Return
item.description: Misia Butler, Eden Hambelton Davies and Jack Rowan will step into fan-favorite roles for the return of the hit drama, based on Holly Jackson’s bestselling novels.

item.title: Outrage-Sparking BBC Doc Following Children in Gaza Breached Accuracy Guideline, Review Finds
item.description: The public broadcaster came under fire in February when one of the 13-year-old subjects in the film, a young boy called Abdullah Al-Yazouri, was found to be the son of a Hamas official.

item.title: Outrage-Sparking BBC Doc Following Children in Gaza Breached Accuracy Guideline, Review Finds
item.description: The public broadcaster came under fire in February when one of the 13-year-old subjects in the film, a young boy called Abdullah Al-Yazouri, was found to be the son of a Hamas official.

item.title: BBC Tells Gregg Wallace a Return to ‘MasterChef’ Is “Untenable” After Report Upholds 45 Allegations
item.description: The TV star has been fired after more than 50 people came forward with allegations, including ones of inappropriate sexual language, groping and racist comments.

item.title: BBC Tells Gregg Wallace a Return to ‘MasterChef’ Is “Untenable” After Report Upholds 45 Allegations
item.description: The TV star has been fired after more than 50 people came forward with allegations, including ones of inappropriate sexual language, groping and racist comments.

item.title: ‘The Salt Path’ Fallout: Raynor Winn’s Next Book Delayed as Publisher Supports “Distressed” Author
item.description: After an investigation cast into doubt the events of her best-selling memoir, Winn’s publisher has been forced to delay her next book, ‘On Winter Hill.’

item.title: ‘The Salt Path’ Fallout: Raynor Winn’s Next Book Delayed as Publisher Supports “Distressed” Author
item.description: After an investigation cast into doubt the events of her best-selling memoir, Winn’s publisher has been forced to delay her next book, ‘On Winter Hill.’

item.title: Paramount+ Gives London a Chance to Live Like a Killer at Immersive Event ‘Dexter: The Experience’
item.description: In celebration of the release of ‘Dexter: Resurrection,’ the immersive experience is allowing fans to join the Miami Metro Police Department and piece together body parts left by the Ice Truck Killer.

item.title: Paramount+ Gives London a Chance to Live Like a Killer at Immersive Event ‘Dexter: The Experience’
item.description: In celebration of the release of ‘Dexter: Resurrection,’ the immersive experience is allowing fans to join the Miami Metro Police Department and piece together body parts left by the Ice Truck Killer.

item.title: Spy Thriller ‘The Partisan’ Sets October Theatrical Release as Capture Inks Key Pre-Sales (Exclusive)
item.description: Malcolm McDowell stars in the World War II movie about the exploits of one of Britain’s premier female spies, Krystyna Skarbek.

item.title: Spy Thriller ‘The Partisan’ Sets October Theatrical Release as Capture Inks Key Pre-Sales (Exclusive)
item.description: Malcolm McDowell stars in the World War II movie about the exploits of one of Britain’s premier female spies, Krystyna Skarbek.
